verses.name: Luke 4:14
verses.text: And Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit into Galilee: and there went out a fame of him through all the region round about.

verses.name: Luke 4:15
verses.text: And he taught in their synagogues, being glorified of all.

verses.name: Luke 4:16
verses.text: And he came to Nazareth, where he had been brought up: and, as his custom was, he went into the synagogue on the sabbath day, and stood up for to read.

verses.name: Luke 4:17
verses.text: And there was delivered unto him the book of the prophet Esaias. And when he had opened the book, he found the place where it was written,
